sect2.title: Zend_Controller Setup
sect2.para: As follows, It sets up according to the modular directory structure of Zend_Controller.
config, lib, and a log directory are added to the modular directory structure of Zend_Controller. In a config directory, the following environment.php are created as a common setting file.
sect2.programlisting:
<?php
define('PROJECT_ROOT_DIR', dirname(dirname(__FILE__)));

$packages = array(PROJECT_ROOT_DIR . '/lib');
ini_set('include_path', implode(PATH_SEPARATOR, $packages) . PATH_SEPARATOR . ini_get('include_path') );

sect2.title: S2Container Setup
Creation of action
sect2.para: The template of index action is edited. application/default/views/scripts/index/index.phtml My first Zend Framework App greeting : greeting; ?>
If index page is accessed, it will be displayed as "greeting : Hello World !!".

sect2.title: Using Mock
sect2.para: The aspect of MockInterceptor is carried out to a Hoge class, and the return value of greeting method is set up.
sect2.programlisting:
<?php
class Hoge {
    /**
     * @S2Aspect('interceptor' => 'new seasar\aop\interceptor\MockInterceptor')
     * @S2Mock('return' => 'strval("Bye World !!")')
     */
    public function greeting() {
        return 'Hello World !!';
    }
}
sect2.para: If index page is accessed, it will be displayed as "greeting : Bye World !!".
sect2.programlisting:
<?php
require_once PROJECT_ROOT_DIR . '/config/s2.php';
use seasar\container\S2ApplicationContext as s2app;
s2app::import(dirname(dirname(__FILE__)) . '/models/index');
s2app::registerAspect('/^Hoge$/', 'new seasar\aop\interceptor\MockInterceptor');

require_once 'Zend/Controller/Action.php';
class IndexController extends Zend_Controller_Action {
    public function indexAction() {
       $this->view->greeting = s2app::get('Hoge')->greeting();
    }
}
